name: Simple DS Series Vol. 15: The Kanshikikan 2 - Aratanaru 8-tsu no Jiken wo Touch seyo
summary: Simple DS Series Vol. 15: The Kanshikikan 2 - Aratanaru 8-tsu no Jiken wo Touch seyo is an Adventure game, developed by Tomcat System and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.
